item.description:
Rock Meadow is a large parcel of meadowlands, wetlands, woodlands and community
gardens on about 70 acres of conservation land in the northwest corner of Belmont. This piece of land is adjacent to other parcels of open land, including the former sight of a state hospital. We've walked here a couple of times before and I have downloaded a trail map to my gps to help guide us.

There is a brown and white sign indicating the entrance to the parking lot on Mill Street.
item.name: Belmont's Rock Meadow
